title: Lemon Pecan Slab Pie
instructions: For crust: Mix flour and sugar. Cut in butter until crumbly. Add egg yolks and water. Press into 15x10 jelly roll pan. Bake 15 minutes at 350°. For filling: Whisk melted butter, sugar, eggs, corn syrup, lemon juice, and zest. Stir in pecans. Pour over crust. Bake 25-30 minutes until set. Cool and cut into bars.
